title: I need a complete Ecommerce Growth Strategy including Budgetplan & ROI | All Channels
snippet:
Hi there,

We still did not found a descent Digital Marketing Manager, therefore we need to have some support from a very experienced Digital Specialist who successfully build up massive traffic on any eCommerce platform ! 
I get it , the more budget we can spend , the more traffic we can get - Ok , that's fine - but no Art at all. 
We need a strategy for Month 1 - Month 3 & then until Month 6 to make sure we don't just throw away money. 

It should include (Ecommerce) :
1. Marketing Strategy - All recommended Channels of Digital Marketing incl. Analytic Tools
2. Marketing Plan - Budget & ROI VS Expected Traffic Analytics ( Best could be an excel Template / Macro) 
3. Marketing Planning / Schedule Template ( Excel & Highly Professional) with Measurements & Success tracking logic

Please spare your time to contact me if you are an hobby digital marketing wannabe !

Thanks
